channel.title: Paying RS Gold if you help me! Error connecting to server problem!
channel.description:
Well the title IS true, I am paying rs gold but only 150k. (Better than nothing right?) Anyways, whenever I try to log in something it gives me that message of "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click start new server and log in again" Well I did that and guess what, it didn't work. So I heard something about this hamachi thing, I'm not sure exactly what it is but I don't really want to download it. If anyone were to help me out by posting I am willing to pay. I am willing to try anything but download more things. Thanks for all your help! Hassan
P.S. Also please do NOT email me for the answer. I would prefer posting but pm if you have to. Thanks again!

item.title: Paying RS Gold if you help me! Error connecting to server problem!
item.dc:creator: @_0mfg0rz ~0mfg0rz~
item.description:
@_0mfg0rz wrote:

If that happens i suggest that you do this download
Hamachi at Hamachi.cc
then download it and blah…
the go to advertisments and find one using Hamachi …
then go to join server and type in something ex . Ashley_PK
pass - 123

then it tells you an ip in the advertisment ex. 5.139.158.32
also it tells you a port - ex. 43594

try the information i gave you i really hope i helped thanks , BTW TRADING THINGS FOR RS2 GOLD IS ILLEGAL WITH AN EXPESTION OF SCAR SCRIPS

~0mfg0rz~

Read full topic

item.source: Paying RS Gold if you help me! Error connecting to server problem!

item.title: Paying RS Gold if you help me! Error connecting to server problem!
item.dc:creator: @Hassan_Rules Hassan_Rules
item.description:
@Hassan_Rules wrote:

I’ve tried going to the no-ip addresses and they don’t work. The same message pops up. I’ll tell you guys the steps of what I did, if I’m making a mistake please tell me.

  1. I open MoparScape Client
  2. Click Start Server
  3. I find an ip address (madman5.no-ip.org) and type it in section
  4. Use my username and password there and log in.
  5. I get Error message.
    If anyone knows what I’m doing wrong please report. Thanks Hassan

Read full topic
item.source: Paying RS Gold if you help me! Error connecting to server problem!

item.title: Paying RS Gold if you help me! Error connecting to server problem!
item.dc:creator: @cool_secret cool secret
item.description:
@cool_secret wrote:

Ok herse my lecture:

Hamatchi is a program for joining networks, certain servers have hamatchi some dont example mine. The reason that doesnt work is as said before the 127.0.0.1 server has been down, its the main moparscape server thats started when you pull up moparscape. If your having this problem joining another server its because the server is down due to crashing, restarting, or just they had to turn server off.

Read full topic

item.title: Paying RS Gold if you help me! Error connecting to server problem!
item.dc:creator: @FargoV2 FargoV2
item.description:
@FargoV2 wrote:

there really is no other way to not play if u dont have hamachi inless u play srevers with no-ip…

for example someones ip would be…XXXXscape.NO-IP.biz

u should read mod thoraks server guide it will help alot

hope i helped

So just try to join someone elses server.
